description.narrative: JV LLC Nyva Pereyaslavshchyny (Nyva or the Company), based in Ukraine, is a vertically integrated pork producer with crop cultivation and processing, pig farming, slaughtering and meat processing operations. The Company is the second largest market player in the Ukrainian industrial pork market. The proposed investment is part of the IFCs COVID-19 response Real Sector Crisis Envelope and consists of a senior secured A loan of up to US$20 million (the IFC Loan). Due to COVID-19-related uncertainties in the supply chain of raw materials, Nyva is significantly increasing its raw material inventory in order to avoid any production disruptions. The IFC Loan will be used to fund the Companys working capital needs.

Contribution to Market Creation: The Project will promote sector resilience by limiting disruptions along the pork supply chain.
